public FileUploadSession(string fileName, string savingDirectory, long fileSize, long maxChunkSize)

Parameters

fileName string

The name of the file being uploaded.

savingDirectory string

The directory where the file is being saved.

fileSize long

The size of the file being uploaded.

maxChunkSize long

The maximum size of each chunk.

ArgumentException

Thrown when any of the parameters are invalid.
